subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In its first game since losing the versatile forward Robbie Hummel to a knee injury, No. 3 Purdue had its 10-game winning streak stopped by No. 14 Michigan State.
snippet: In its first game since losing the versatile forward Robbie Hummel to a knee injury, No. 3 Purdue had its 10-game winning streak stopped by No. 14 Michigan State.
